content: I actually participated in the "Turbocharged Tuesdays" auto racing event at the Speed Demon Racing Track on March 15th, where I managed to complete 10 laps with an average speed of 85mph. I didn't make it to the top 5, but I was able to shave off 2 seconds from my previous best time. Can you provide more specific guidance on suspension settings for that track, considering my experience and results?
